hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ocarina#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that Morpha is easily trapped in a corner.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Zelda's Letter# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #0# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #an Ocarina#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bow# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #lakeside lab diving experiment# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Ganon's Tower#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Sun's Song# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
